naval_deployments.name: CSG-3 — USS Abraham Lincoln (CVN-72)
naval_deployments.notes: Operating in Western Pacific, 7th Fleet. Conducting presence ops in SCS region.

naval_deployments.name: CSG-5 — USS Ronald Reagan (CVN-76)
naval_deployments.notes: Homeported Yokosuka. Reagan transitioning — Lincoln took over 7th Fleet duties.

naval_deployments.name: CSG-12 — USS Gerald R. Ford (CVN-78)
naval_deployments.notes: Operating in Eastern Med. Supporting regional deterrence amid Iran-Israel tensions.

naval_deployments.name: CSG-9 — USS Nimitz (CVN-68)
naval_deployments.notes: 5th Fleet AOR. Supporting Red Sea/Houthi ops and Iran deterrence.

naval_deployments.name: ARG — USS Bataan (LHD-5)
naval_deployments.notes: MEU embarked. Operating in Med with NATO partners.

naval_deployments.name: ARG — USS Boxer (LHD-4)
naval_deployments.notes: In port San Diego undergoing scheduled maintenance.

naval_deployments.name: SSBN Patrol — Atlantic
naval_deployments.notes: Ohio-class SSBN on deterrent patrol. Location classified.

naval_deployments.name: SSBN Patrol — Pacific
naval_deployments.notes: Ohio-class SSBN on deterrent patrol. Location classified.

naval_deployments.name: 🇷🇺 Northern Fleet — Severomorsk
naval_deployments.notes: Reduced activity. Several vessels undergoing repair after combat losses in Black Sea campaign.

naval_deployments.name: 🇷🇺 Black Sea Fleet — Sevastopol
naval_deployments.notes: Fleet largely relocated to Novorossiysk after Ukrainian drone/missile strikes on Sevastopol. Significantly degraded.

naval_deployments.name: 🇨🇳 PLA Navy — South Sea Fleet
naval_deployments.location: South China Sea / Sanya Naval Base
naval_deployments.notes: Carrier Fujian conducting training ops. Heightened activity near Taiwan Strait.

naval_deployments.name: 🇮🇷 IRIN — Bandar Abbas
naval_deployments.notes: IRGCN fast-boats active in Gulf. US-Iran nuclear talks ongoing in Geneva (Feb 26). Posture cautiously elevated.

chokepoints.name: Strait of Hormuz
chokepoints.note: Iranian naval posturing — IRGCN fast boats active

chokepoints.name: Bab el-Mandeb
chokepoints.note: Houthi anti-ship missile/drone threat — coalition patrols active

chokepoints.name: Taiwan Strait
chokepoints.note: PLA Navy exercises — US transits ongoing

chokepoints.name: Suez Canal
chokepoints.note: Operating normally — traffic diversions from Red Sea

chokepoints.name: GIUK Gap
chokepoints.note: Russian submarine transit monitoring — P-8 patrols

conflicts.name: Ukraine-Russia War
conflicts.update: Zelenskyy spoke with Trump Feb 25 re: peace talks. US-Ukraine envoys meeting Geneva Feb 26. Russia recruiting 1,700+ African mercenaries per Ukraine intel. Frontlines largely static in Donbas.

conflicts.name: Gaza Conflict
conflicts.update: Modi addressed Israeli Knesset Feb 25. Hostage negotiations ongoing. IDF continuing operations in Gaza. Modi: 'No cause justifies killing civilians.'

conflicts.name: Red Sea / Houthi Campaign
conflicts.update: Houthi attacks on shipping continuing. US Navy (Nimitz CSG) maintaining presence in North Arabian Sea. Commercial traffic rerouting via Cape of Good Hope.

conflicts.name: Israel-Lebanon Border
conflicts.update: Ceasefire largely holding. IDF maintaining buffer zone in southern Lebanon. Sporadic incidents reported but no major escalation.

conflicts.name: Syria — Post-Assad Transition
conflicts.update: HTS-led government consolidating control. Turkey, US, Israel all maintaining forces/influence. ISIS remnants active in eastern Syria.

conflicts.name: Taiwan Strait Tensions
conflicts.update: PLA Fujian carrier conducting drills near strait. Philippines People Power anniversary protests. US maintaining freedom of navigation transits.

conflicts.name: South China Sea Disputes
conflicts.update: PLA Navy activity elevated near Spratly Islands. Philippines-China standoffs continuing at Second Thomas Shoal. US presence maintained.

conflicts.name: Iran-Israel / US-Iran Tensions
conflicts.update: US-Iran nuclear talks in Geneva Feb 26. Trump weighing options post-State of the Union. Next round could be decisive. Ford CSG in Eastern Med as deterrent backdrop.

exercises.name: DEFENDER EUROPE 2026
exercises.notes: Annual large-scale NATO exercise. Planning underway.

exercises.name: STEADFAST DEFENDER 2026
exercises.notes: NATO's largest defensive exercise. Focus on eastern flank defense.

exercises.name: COBRA GOLD 2026
exercises.participants: US, Thailand, Japan, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, South Korea
exercises.notes: Largest multilateral exercise in Indo-Pacific. Currently active as of Feb 25.

exercises.name: KEEN SWORD 2026
exercises.notes: Completed. Biennial US-Japan bilateral. Next edition 2027.

exercises.name: VOSTOK (Russia)
exercises.notes: Annual Russian strategic exercise in Eastern Military District.

exercises.name: JOINT SWORD (China)
exercises.notes: China conducts unannounced JOINT SWORD exercises in response to Taiwan events. Monitor for triggers.

exercises.name: RED FLAG 26-1
exercises.notes: First RED FLAG of 2026 completed. RED FLAG 26-2 planned for spring.

gps_zones.name: Eastern Ukraine / Donbas
gps_zones.notes: Active Russian GPS jamming and spoofing. Affects both military and civil aviation.

gps_zones.name: Northern Finland / Lapland
gps_zones.notes: Russian jamming from Kola Peninsula affecting Finnish and Norwegian airspace. Ongoing.

gps_zones.name: Baltic States
gps_zones.notes: Intermittent Russian jamming. Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania affected. NATO monitoring.

gps_zones.name: Black Sea / Romania
gps_zones.notes: Spoofing incidents reported over Black Sea. Vessels reporting false positions.

gps_zones.name: Israel / Eastern Mediterranean
gps_zones.notes: Active GPS jamming by IDF over Israel and Lebanon. Ongoing since Oct 2023 war.

gps_zones.name: Syria / Iraq border
gps_zones.notes: Multi-source jamming. US, Russian, Turkish forces all operating jamming systems.

gps_zones.name: Red Sea / Yemen
gps_zones.notes: Houthi spoofing affecting commercial shipping navigation. Incidents ongoing.

gps_zones.name: Taiwan Strait
gps_zones.notes: PLA jamming exercises. Intermittent disruption to civil aviation.

gps_zones.name: South China Sea — Spratly Islands
gps_zones.notes: Chinese jamming operations around artificial islands. Reported by Philippine vessels.

gps_zones.name: Kaliningrad / Poland border
gps_zones.notes: Russian Kaliningrad exclave jamming affecting NE Poland and Lithuania airspace.

gps_zones.name: Persian Gulf / Hormuz
gps_zones.notes: Intermittent Iranian GPS spoofing. Reduced since nuclear talks began but not eliminated.

notams.name: Ukraine Airspace NOTAM
notams.notes: Ukrainian airspace fully closed to civil aviation. Active conflict.

notams.name: Israel / Gaza TFR
notams.notes: TFR active over Gaza and southern Israel. Limited civil ops from TLV with restrictions.

notams.name: Red Sea NOTAM
notams.notes: UKMTO and US Navy warnings active. Commercial vessels avoiding core Red Sea lanes.

notams.name: Lebanon Airspace Restrictions
notams.notes: Beirut airport operational but restrictions active in south Lebanon.

notams.name: Iran ADIZ Alert
notams.notes: Heightened Iranian air defense posture during Geneva talks. Monitor for changes.

notams.name: Taiwan Strait Notice
notams.notes: PLA military activity in strait. Airlines rerouting. Monitor for JOINT SWORD trigger.

notams.name: Baltic Air Policing
notams.notes: NATO Enhanced Air Policing active. Increased intercept activity of Russian aircraft.

notams.name: Red Flag 26-1 TFR (expired)
notams.notes: RED FLAG 26-1 completed Jan 2026. Next exercise TFR expected spring.

notams.name: North Korea ADIZ / Exclusion
notams.notes: North Korean airspace fully restricted. Recent missile tests. ICAO warnings active.

notams.name: Sudan Airspace NOTAM
notams.notes: RSF-SAF civil war ongoing. Khartoum area dangerous. Sporadic airspace closures.

centcom_assets.ground: Pre-positioned forces Kuwait, Qatar, UAE, Bahrain
